text: 12.6 2 Ko 10.8, 11.16 Pen yɨb yad ke dad aplaneb takaw ogɨnap ma mɨdek ma agebin. Yad pen anɨgɨl agɨl, bɨ sawl agup tek mel, taynen, yad takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨnɨgayn. Yad yɨb yad ke dad aplanen, binɨb ogɨnap yɨp nɨŋɨd, ak bɨ tep ke mɨdeb agel, yɨp tep ma gɨpɨkop. Yɨp tep gup ak, gɨpin gɨpin tek nɨŋɨd akaŋ, takaw apin tek nɨŋɨd, bɨ tay tek mɨdebin ak kɨli ke nɨgɨnɨgel.
